tool_description: Sports fantasy data at your fingertips - NFL, NBA, MLB, and NHL
name: Fantasy Sports (NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL)
title: Fantasy Sports (NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL)

api_list.name: NHL - Rest of Season (by position)
api_list.description:
Provides rest of season fantasy projections for a specific position.

Position Abbv: F, C, W, D, G
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-sports-nfl-nba-mlb-nhl.p.rapidapi.com/hockey/categories/restofseason/G"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-sports-nfl-nba-mlb-nhl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-sports-nfl-nba-mlb-nhl.p.rapidapi.com/hockey/categories/restofseason/{position}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-sports-nfl-nba-mlb-nhl.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
